title: Sans serif corporate identity. Primary type.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054736im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CMYK_grey_4058.jpg)

We were told this type was Helvetica for our corporate id. Our primary type is supposed to be Helvetica, which this is not!  
Help!

Font: 

 Gotham Medium and light 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054736/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: NicolaPilky

comments.content: It look a lot like Pluto Sans & Centrale Sans, but It's not!
You could try looking at myfonts, with filters sans-serif / geometric, perhaps you'll find it

Ferfolio, yeah - looks so much like a lot of typefaces. Thanks though :)

Ryuk - hero! On the money! Thanks :)
